item.title: [PI] castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

Well down to 8 errors. I just realised that the zamorakWait etc are in there but named not like that.

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2763: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.saradominWait.remove(Server.castleWars.saradominWait.i ndexOf(c.playerId)); ^ symbol: variable saradominWait location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2763: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.saradominWait.remove(Server.castleWars.saradominWait.i ndexOf(c.playerId)); ^ symbol: variable saradominWait location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2765: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.saradomin.remove(Server.castleWars.saradomin.indexOf(c .playerId)); ^ symbol: variable saradomin location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2765: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.saradomin.remove(Server.castleWars.saradomin.indexOf(c .playerId)); ^ symbol: variable saradomin location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2769: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.zamorakWait.remove(Server.castleWars.zamorakWait.index Of(c.playerId)); ^ symbol: variable zamorakWait location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2769: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.zamorakWait.remove(Server.castleWars.zamorakWait.index Of(c.playerId)); ^ symbol: variable zamorakWait location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2771: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.zamorak.remove(Server.castleWars.zamorak.indexOf(c.pla yerId)); ^ symbol: variable zamorak location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2771: error: cannot find symbol Server.castleWars.zamorak.remove(Server.castleWars.zamorak.indexOf(c.pla yerId)); ^ symbol: variable zamorak location: variable castleWars of type CastleWars Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Help me find them plox?

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I just searched the entire CastleWars file…
saradominWait doesn’t exist
saradomin doesn’t exist
zamorakWait doesn’t exist
zamroak doesn’t exist
joinWait doesn’t exist

So yeah, all that is missing… And that was at first glance…
